text: He imana rakhanaryanno! Tumhi allaha ani tyacya paigambaracya adesance anusarana kara, jevha paigambara tumhala tumacya jivanadayi visayakade bolavita asatila ani smarana rakha ki allaha manavacya ani tyacya hrdayacya daramyana ada banato ani nihsansaya tumhala allahacyaca javala ekatra vhayace ahe
